name: GBAdvanceIDE
short_description:
Does anyone else remember back in the older days when they would walk around with a taco with the screen on it? No, not the N-Gage, the smaller taco. Yes, the GameBoy Advance.
Myself (the developer,) I am a 2000's kid at heart, but was too young to remember the GBA days that well. However that doesn't keep me from its homebrew scene.
For months I've wanted to make GBA games, but have gotten frustrated as the scene is fading out, and HAM's website (ngine.de) is down. Even so, for a programmer: if you want something but it isn't there, then make it.
And that's how the project you see now got started.
summary: A Program For Making GameBoy Advance Games
